attribute.name: notifyLifecycleListenerOnFailure
attribute.description: notify lifecycleListener from message transfer failure

attribute.name: clusterLogName
attribute.description: Name of cluster transfer log device

operation.name: setProperty
operation.description: set a property to all cluster managers (with prefix 'manager.')

operation.name: send
operation.description: send message to all cluster members

operation.name: sendClusterDomain
operation.description: send message to all cluster members with same domain

operation.name: sendToMember
operation.description: send message to one cluster member

attribute.name: tcpThreadCount
attribute.description: number of tcp listener worker threads

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: soTimeout and acknowledge timeout (default no timeout (-1), use msec)

attribute.name: nrOfMsgsReceived
attribute.description: number of messages received from other nodes

attribute.name: tcpListenTimeout
attribute.description: max tcp listen timeout (sec) wait for ServerSocket start

attribute.name: nrOfMsgsReceived
attribute.description: number of messages received from other nodes

attribute.name: timeout
attribute.description: soTimeout and acknowledge timeout (default no timeout (-1), use msec)

attribute.name: autoConnect
attribute.description: is sender disabled, fork a new socket

attribute.name: waitForAck
attribute.description: Wait for ack after data send

attribute.name: nrOfRequests
attribute.description: number of send messages to other members

operation.name: checkKeepAlive
operation.description: Check all sender connection for close socket (keepalive)

attribute.name: waitForAck
attribute.description: Wait for ack after data send

attribute.name: ackTimeout
attribute.description: acknowledge timeout acknowledge timeout (deprecated use timeout)

attribute.name: queuedNrOfBytes
attribute.description: number of bytes over all queued messages

attribute.name: resend
attribute.description: after send failure make a resend

attribute.name: nrOfRequests
attribute.description: number of send messages to other members

attribute.name: waitForAck
attribute.description: Wait for ack after data send

attribute.name: queuedNrOfBytes
attribute.description: number of bytes over all queued messages

attribute.name: resend
attribute.description: after send failure make a resend (default true)

attribute.name: recoverTimeout
attribute.description: recover Timeout after push message failure (default 5000 msec)

attribute.name: recoverCounter
attribute.description: number of recover tries (default 0 - means off)

attribute.name: nrOfRequests
attribute.description: number of send messages to other members

attribute.name: queueAddWaitTime
attribute.description: queue add wait time (tomcat thread waits) (msec)

attribute.name: queueRemoveWaitTime
attribute.description: queue remove wait time (queue thread waits) (msec)

attribute.name: waitForAck
attribute.description: Wait for ack after data send

attribute.name: inUsePoolSize
attribute.description: get size of current busy SocketSender from pool

attribute.name: resend
attribute.description: after send failure make a resend

attribute.name: nrOfRequests
attribute.description: number of send messages to other members

operation.name: connect
operation.description: start Queue to connect to ohter replication node

operation.name: disconnect
operation.description: stop Queue to other replication node

attribute.name: waitForAck
attribute.description: Wait for ack after data send (default false)

attribute.name: resend
attribute.description: after send failure make a resend

attribute.name: nrOfRequests
attribute.description: number of send messages to other members

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: filter
attribute.description: resource filter to disable session replication check

attribute.name: primaryIndicator
attribute.description: set indicator that request processing is at primary session node

attribute.name: primaryIndicatorName
attribute.description: Request attribute name to indicate that request processing is at primary session node

attribute.name: nrOfCrossContextSendRequests
attribute.description: number of send cross context session requests
